issue.title: [C++] Factor out parsing routines
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3060](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3060). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We have implementations of casting strings to numbers in the `compute` directory. Those can be more broadly useful (for example when parsing CSV files). We should therefore centralize them in their own C++ module.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3060?focusedCommentId=16584520) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 2433
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2433>
